TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ControlParameter extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter

summary.span: 將 的屬性值繫結至參數物件。

span.span: Binds the value of a property of a to a parameter object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用類別，以繫結的值屬性，例如或，若要使用參數化的 SQL 查詢、 商務物件方法或篩選條件運算式中的參數。You can use the class to bind the value of a property, such as or , to a parameter that is used in a parameterized SQL query, business object method, or filtering expression. 類別提供兩個屬性，除了繼承自類別：和。The class provides two properties in addition to those inherited from the class: and . 屬性會識別這繫結至執行個體和屬性會識別之公開屬性從中類別擷取的值。The property identifies which instance to bind to and the property identifies the public property of the from which the class retrieves a value. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用物件中顯示的資料繫結控制項的選取值宣告式案例中的控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use a object to bind data displayed in a control to the selected value of a control in a declarative scenario. 物件加入至的集合控制項在表單中，並對應至 「@Title」 中的預留位置文字屬性。The object is added to the collection of the control on the form, and corresponds to the "@Title" placeholder text in the property. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_2sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_2sql/CS/sql2cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_2sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_2sql/VB/sql2vb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks A物件來建立建構函式會以其所有屬性的預設值初始化。A object that is created with the constructor is initialized with default values for all its properties. 並屬性會初始化為。The and properties are initialized to . 颾魤 ㄛ屬性會初始化為，則屬性會初始化為，則屬性會初始化為，和屬性會初始化為`null`.In addition, the property is initialized to , the property is initialized to , the property is initialized to , and the property is initialized to `null`. ## Examples 下列程式碼示範如何建立物件建構函式。The following code shows how to create a object with the constructor. 物件繫結屬性要參數化 SQL 查詢，以擷取資料，會顯示在控制項控制項。The object binds the property of a control to a parameterized SQL query that retrieves data that is displayed in a control. remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性是必要的屬性可識別執行個體物件繫結至在執行階段。The property is a required property that identifies the instance that the object binds to at run time. 通常並設定的屬性方法正確繫結至控制項。Typically, the and properties are set for the method to correctly bind to a control. 如果您未設定屬性，方法會擲回例外狀況時呼叫。If you do not set the property, the method throws an exception when called. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用物件中顯示的資料繫結控制項的選取值宣告式案例中的控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use a object to bind data displayed in a control to the selected value of a control in a declarative scenario. 物件加入至的集合控制項在表單中，並對應至 「@Title」 中的預留位置文字屬性。The object is added to the collection of the control on the form, and corresponds to the "@Title" placeholder text in the property. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_2sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_2sql/CS/sql2cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_2sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_2sql/VB/sql2vb.aspx#1)] 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定並來識別控制項的屬性，物件繫結。The following code example demonstrates how to set the and properties to identify the control that a object is bound to. 此範例會填入值的控制項。The example populates a control with values. 的屬性控制項來篩選所擷取的資料控制項，並顯示控制項。The property of the control is used to filter data retrieved by a control and displayed by a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter_2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter_2/CS/webform1cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter_2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter_2/VB/webform1vb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 物件會嘗試繫結至物件和屬性每次呼叫方法。The object attempts to bind to the object and property every time the method is called. 方法會傳回值的組合所識別之控制項的屬性和屬性。The method returns the value of the control's property that is identified by the combination of the and properties. 類別永遠不會使用屬性，它繼承自，當繫結至控制項的屬性值。The class never uses the property, which is inherited from , when binding to a control's property value. > [!NOTE] > 在此實作中的方法，`context`參數會被忽略。In this implementation of the method, the `context` parameter is ignored. 如果 `control` 參數為 `null`，則會傳回 `null`。If the `control` parameter is `null`, `null` is returned.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性識別之公開屬性所識別的物件屬性，物件繫結至在執行階段。The property identifies the public property of the object identified by the property that the object binds to at run time. 可以設定為簡單的字串，例如 「 SelectedValue"，或使用運算式來識別複雜的控制項屬性的語法。 can be set to a simple string, such as "SelectedValue", or an expression using syntax to identify complex control properties. 雖然屬性通常是選擇性的兩者並設定的屬性方法正確繫結至控制項。While the property is optional, typically both and properties are set for the method to correctly bind to a control. 如果您設定屬性而非屬性，方法會嘗試使用屬性，以識別預設屬性。If you set the property but not the property, the method attempts to use the attribute to identify a default property. （它是控制項作者，來指定這個屬性的責任）。如果失敗，會擲回例外狀況。(It is the responsibility of control authors to specify this attribute.) If this fails, throws an exception. 下表會識別哪一個 ASP.NET 控制項裝飾屬性屬性。The following table identifies which ASP.NET controls decorate properties with the attribute. |控制項Control|屬性Property| |-------------|--------------| ||| ||| ||| ||| ||| ||| ||| ||| ||| ||| ||| ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用物件中顯示的資料繫結控制項的選取值宣告式案例中的控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use a object to bind data displayed in a control to the selected value of a control in a declarative scenario. 控制項是衍生自控制項。The control derives from the control. 物件加入至的集合控制項在表單中，並對應至 「@Title」 中的預留位置文字屬性。The object is added to the collection of the control on the form, and corresponds to the "@Title" placeholder text in the property. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_2sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_2sql/CS/sql2cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_2sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_2sql/VB/sql2vb.aspx#1)] 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定並來識別控制項的屬性，物件繫結。The following code example demonstrates how to set the and properties to identify the control that a object is bound to. 此範例會填入值的控制項。The example populates a control with values. 的屬性控制項來篩選所擷取的資料控制項，並顯示控制項。The property of the control is used to filter data retrieved by a control and displayed by a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter_2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter_2/CS/webform1cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter_2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter_2/VB/webform1vb.aspx#1)]
